abstract: MTV staged a series of conversations in Pennsylvania between each of the two remaining Democratic presidential nominees and a group of young veterans of the Iraq war, and plans to televise the dialogues across all the network’s cable channels tonight at 6 p.m.
lead_paragraph: MTV staged a series of conversations in Pennsylvania between each of the two remaining Democratic presidential nominees and a group of young veterans of the Iraq war, and plans to televise the dialogues across all the network’s cable channels tonight at 6 p.m.

headline.main: I Want My… Candidates to Chat With Veterans
